TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UrlAuthorizationModule extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpModule
Public NotInheritable Class UrlAuthorizationModule Implements IHttpModule
public ref class UrlAuthorizationModule sealed : System::Web::IHttpModule

summary.span: 验证用户具有访问所请求的 URL 的权限。

span.span: Verifies that the user has permission to access the URL requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定当前用户是否请求的 url，根据用户允许访问或角色的成员的用户列表。The determines whether the current user is permitted access to the requested URL, based on the user or the list of roles that a user is a member of. 有关如何确定用户名称的信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。For information about how the user name is determined, see [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 有关如何管理用户角色的信息，请参阅[使用角色管理授权](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01954ce4-39a2-487f-8153-a69f6f6f3195)。For information about how to manage user roles, see [Managing Authorization Using Roles](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01954ce4-39a2-487f-8153-a69f6f6f3195). 为用户或角色的授权管理使用的配置元素。Authorization for a user or a role is managed using the configuration element. 您可以允许或拒绝用户或角色使用`allow`或`deny`子元素，分别。You can allow or deny a user or a role using the `allow` or `deny` subelements, respectively. `allow`和`deny`子元素解释它们出现在配置中的顺序。The `allow` and `deny` subelements are interpreted in the order they appear in the configuration. 元素指定允许或拒绝访问后完成其授权检查。Once an element specifies that access is allowed or denied, the completes its authorization check. 例如下, 一节从 Web.config 文件要求用户 （通过拒绝匿名用户），登录，然后仅允许用户要具有访问权限的管理员角色中。For example, the following section from a Web.config file requires users to log on (by denying anonymous users), and then allows only users in the Administrators role to have access. 不在的管理员角色的用户被拒绝。Users not in the Administrators role are denied. ``` ``` 用户或角色必须专门为拒绝，若要拒绝对 URL 的用户或角色授予的权限。A user or role must be specifically denied to refuse the user or role permission to a URL. 也就是说，如果不指定前面的示例一样``元素，则所有经过身份验证的用户已允许访问所请求的 URL，而不考虑哪些角色它们是一样的成员。That is, if the previous example had not specified the `` element, then all authenticated users would have been allowed access to the requested URL, regardless of what role they were a member of. ## Examples 下面的代码示例在拒绝对 John 和所有匿名用户，供 Kim 和管理员角色的成员授予访问权限。The following code example grants access to Kim and members of the Admins role, while denying it to John and all anonymous users. ``` ```

span.span: Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不应从应用程序代码中调用。This constructor is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 调用此构造函数可创建的实例类。ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the class. 后调用的构造函数，它调用方法以初始化新对象。After calling the constructor, it calls the method to initialize the new object.

Public Shared Function CheckUrlAccessForPrincipal (virtualPath As String, user As IPrincipal, verb As String) As Boolean
public: static bool CheckUrlAccessForPrincipal(System::String ^ virtualPath, System::Security::Principal::IPrincipal ^ user, System::String ^ verb);

span.span: The virtual path to the file.

param.name: user
param.span: 一个表示当前用户的 对象。

span.span: An object representing the current user.

param.name: verb
param.span: 用于进行请求的 HTTP 谓词。

span.span: The HTTP verb used to make the request.

summary.span: 确定用户是否具有对所请求的文件的访问权。

span.span: Determines whether the user has access to the requested file.

returns.span: 如果当前用户可以访问该文件，则返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: if the current user can access the file; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检查以确定当前用户是否被授予访问权限的应用程序的 Web.config 文件中请求的文件。The method checks to see whether the current user is granted access to the requested file in the Web.config file for the application. 用于发出请求的 HTTP 谓词是否`GET`， `POST`，或`HEAD`、方法检查文件的读取访问权限。If the HTTP verb used to make the request is `GET`, `POST`, or `HEAD`, the method checks for read access to the file. 如果使用任何其他谓词，则检查文件的读/写访问权限。If any other verb is used, the checks for read/write access to the file. 有关详细信息和示例 Web.config 文件，请参阅类文档。For more information and an example Web.config file, see the class documentation.

exception.span: 位于应用程序根路径之外。

span.span: is outside of the application root path.
